statements: SELECT * FROM PurchaseOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE unit_price > 50
SELECT * FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE status = 'Pending'
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM PurchaseOrders GROUP BY product_id
SELECT order_id, unit_price * quantity AS total_amount FROM PurchaseOrders
SELECT * FROM PurchaseOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT order_id, product_id, unit_price FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE quantity > 10 AND status='Pending' ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM PurchaseOrders GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT order_id, order_date, delivery_date FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE status='Delivered' AND order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'

SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, unit_price, status FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE product_id IN ('b3de9b57-96e2-4c0e-bc82-4cf9b13e7528', '7c314d4f-41c2-4d90-8a1e-e4e7b6d6cc3f') ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_inventory FROM Inventory WHERE current_inventory < reorder_point;
SELECT product_name, current_inventory, reorder_point FROM Inventory ORDER BY current_inventory DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_quantity, order_date FROM PurchaseOrder WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT product_name, current_inventory, reorder_point FROM Inventory WHERE current_inventory < reorder_point AND reorder_point > 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_inventory FROM Inventory WHERE current_inventory < reorder_point
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_inventory, reorder_point FROM Inventory ORDER BY current_inventory DESC, product_name ASC
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_quantity, order_date FROM PurchaseOrder WHERE status = 'Pending'
SELECT order_id, product_id, SUM(order_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM PurchaseOrder GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 100
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, current_stock, reorder_point FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_point;
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, delivery_date FROM order_history WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT order_id, item_id, quantity, status FROM purchase_orders ORDER BY order_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name ASC, current_stock DESC
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_point
SELECT item_name, current_stock, reorder_point FROM inventory WHERE reorder_point > current_stock ORDER BY reorder_point DESC
SELECT item_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_ordered FROM inventory JOIN purchase_orders ON inventory.item_id = purchase_orders.item_id GROUP BY item_name

SELECT order_id, item_name, quantity, order_date, delivery_date FROM order_history JOIN inventory ON order_history.item_id = inventory.item_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_point;
SELECT supplier_name, sku, quantity FROM purchase_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT sku, product_name, current_stock FROM inventory
SELECT supplier_name, sku, quantity FROM purchase_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin'
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_point
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, current_inventory FROM products
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT product_name FROM products WHERE current_inventory > reorder_point
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_inventory FROM products WHERE current_inventory < 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE current_inventory BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE current_inventory > reorder_point AND reorder_point < 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_inventory, reorder_point FROM products ORDER BY current_inventory DESC, product_name ASC;
